Type.Name: RowInsertedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void RowInsertedHandler(object o, RowInsertedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed RowInsertedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: The following events utilize this delegate:
Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the RowInsertedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the RowInsertedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the RowInsertedHandler is removed from the event.
